meanings.definition: A type of engineered wood product made from wood chips or shavings
meanings.sent1: The carpenter used chipboard to build the shelves in the garage.
meanings.sent2: The furniture factory received a shipment of chipboard for their new line of cabinets.
meanings.sent3: When the termite tried to eat the chipboard, it got a splinter in its teeth!
meanings.sent4: The chipboard walls of the house stood strong against the storm's fury.
meanings.sent5: The smell of fresh chipboard filled the workshop, reminding him of his childhood treehouse.

meanings.definition: A thin, rigid sheet of compressed wood particles used in construction and furniture making
meanings.sent1: She bought chipboard to repair the broken drawer in her dresser.
meanings.sent2: The construction crew laid down chipboard as a temporary flooring solution.
meanings.sent3: The chipboard skateboard didn't last long before it snapped in half!
meanings.sent4: Her dreams were built on chipboard, sturdy yet flexible.
meanings.sent5: The artist painted a vibrant mural on the chipboard wall, transforming the space.
